entities.name: dragons
entities.description: The dragons are described as enormous, vicious-looking, and having different colors such as silvery-blue, green, red, and black. They are also mentioned to be shooting fire from their mouths.

entities.name: wizards
entities.description: The wizards are described as attempting to control the dragons by pulling on chains connected to heavy leather straps around the dragons' necks and legs.

entities.name: enclosure
entities.description: The enclosure is described as being fenced with thick planks of wood, where the dragons are rearing onto their hind legs.

relationships.description: The wizards are attempting to control the dragons by pulling on chains connected to heavy leather straps around the dragons' necks and legs.
The wizards are located near the enclosure where the dragons are being kept.
